name: Torment (itch)
description:
Horror and Platformer game made in 48 hours for the McGame Jam 2018, won "Judges' Favourite"! c:

Made by

  • Leila Essafi - https://twitter.com/Luureii
  • Sumaki / Phi Dai (Steven) Nguyen  - https://twitter.com/IAmSumaki
  • Steven Alexander Kok Shun - https://twitter.com/ZsitteZ

Thanks to Ahmed Al-Salman for the sounds (Salfactor)
and Jeff Johnson for the Magic Mirror.

All students from Independent Video Game Design

Installation Instructions

1. Install the .zip file
2. Extract the .zip file in a folder
3. Run the .exe file
4. Enjoy the game!

Torment is not fully finished and so bugs can be found.
